lake: A small to medium sized body of water
ninja: A sneaky assassin of the night
spear: A medium ranged weapon with a point
bubble: Floaty and circular, made of water
alligator: A large reptile with a big bite
bell: Makes a delightful noise when used
highway: Cars drive on this at high speeds
ball: Throw it around, with your friends. Play catch
evil: Malicious intent, rotten to the core
winter: The cold season when it snows
bridge: Use this to cross to the other side
steel: Really hard material, an upgrade from iron
jogging: The act of running at a medium speed
jealously: An emotion that overcomes one who wants something others have
